story: You hear a faint hum coming from behind the wall, and you can't help but investigate. What do you do?

actions.action: Hack into the security system to uncover the source of the noise.
actions.good: Your expert hacking skills reveal that a group of rogue cyborgs has infiltrated the stronghold, and they are planning something sinister. You gather intel and help take them down, earning valuable rewards for your efforts.
actions.bad: As you delve deeper into the security system, you accidentally trigger an alarm, alerting the rogue cyborgs to your presence. They swarm in, causing damage and preventing you from gathering any meaningful loot.

actions.action: Physically break through the wall to confront whatever is making that noise.
actions.good: With a brute force approach, you smash through the wall and find yourself face-to-face with a group of rogue cyborgs. You take them down and discover valuable rewards hidden behind the wall.
actions.bad: As you break through the wall, you accidentally trigger a concealed trap, causing debris to fall on you and inflict damage. The noise you heard turns out to be nothing more than a malfunctioning machine, and you leave empty-handed.

actions.action: Investigate the source of the noise using stealth techniques.
actions.good: With your stealth skills intact, you make your way behind the wall undetected. You discover the rogue cyborgs and help take them down, earning valuable rewards for your efforts.
actions.bad: As you approach the noise from behind the wall, you accidentally step on a pressure plate, setting off an alarm. The rogue cyborgs swarm in, causing damage and preventing you from gathering any meaningful loot.
